message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the quality you mentioned. I am willing to pay up to $100 for it.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to pay a lower price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $120 for the product.
